Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Lactacin F (LafX, natural AMPs; two-chain class 2b bacteriocins; bacteria, Gram-positive bacteria, prokaryotes. For LafA, see Info; UCLL2a)
Sequence Information.Source: Lactobacillus johnsoniiVPI11088 (Laf+); lactic acid bacteria; human microbiota:gut, symbiont bacteria

Literature Information.Literature: A two-chain bacteriocin. The sequence of the complementary LafA is RNNWQTNVGGAVGSAMIGATVGGTICGPACAVAGAHYLPILWTGVTAATGGFGKIRK.
Literature Information.Author: Allison GE, Fremaux C, Klaenhammer TR.1994
Literature Information.Title: Expansion of bacteriocin activity and host range upon complementation of two peptides encoded within the lactacin F operon.
